release.change: Set notification channel importance to "urgent", which increases reliability of notifications being shown in time.
Empty sections are not shown anymore in the reminders list.
Automatic dark theme on Android 10+ (when enabled in system controls)
The date for a reminder can now be chosen with +/- buttons or with a calendar widget.
The duration until a reminder is due is now shown more precisely.
New: Nagging reminders
When editing a scheduled reminder, the selected time is now set to the due date (and not to the current time as for due or done reminders).
Reminders can now also be edited with a single click in the reminders list.
Added help page
Quick Settings tile to add reminder (on Android 7.0+)
Launcher shortcuts to add reminder / view reminders list on the respective other launcher icon (on Android 7.1+)
Some UI and navigation improvements
Reminders will now be shown in Do Not Disturb mode when in the system settings the "Reminders" category has been allowed for interruption.
Use clock widget instead of spinner for choosing time (only applies to Android 5.0+).
Fixed app not starting on Android 5.1 and below.
On Android 8+ replaced notification settings for sound and priority (which did not have any effect) with a link to the notification channel settings.
Fixed: When scheduled reminders were marked as done or were deleted, they would still be shown at the due time (deleted reminders were attempted to be shown which led to a crash).
Now ask to disable battery optimization on launch as this is essential to the working of SimpleReminder.
Reminders can now be rescheduled by clicking on the notification or selecting a reminder in the list.
First F-Droid release!
